评论概述: Cute, but i had to butcher it. (DIY)
评论详情: I didn't like the inbuilt corset. Not like a corset at all. Well, it's like a halloween costume corset which given the price is expected. I didn't like it under a normal corset so I cutit off.  Cuts off well, is only attached in a vertical piece so just cut it close to the seam and you can just wear a better corset and still enjoy the cuteness.
I loved the product only problem I had was that It was missing the necklace.
Cute but runs small. Not plus size friendly
It's an awkward fit. Larger than listed sizing.

The dress is ok quality. It runs small in the waste area where the belt is. The actual dress fit fine but looked horrible due to the belt being too small and the tie being too short for the size. I had to skip every other hole so I could secure the tie.
It runs small had to modify it and the strings are to short

Exactly as pictured. I was impressed with the quality of the fabric , I expected it to feel cheap but it was actually very nice for the cost. It was true to size , comfortable, had plenty of stretch, and fit me well. It also had a hidden cinching string inside of the lining to help alleviate tension to the built in corset. Which was actually the only real issue I had with the dress. The ‘boning’ felt like it was made out of zip ties. I would have preferred a slightly firmer plastic at the very least, or why bother including it; just seemed a tad silly.  Other than that it was perfect.
Outfit is very cheaply made and doesn't look like the photo. I wouldn't recommend for the price
Nice good quality, size is accrate
Not as pictured at all. Not true to size, very large. Very poor quality. 10/10 would not recommend.

评论概述: Go down 2 sizes, otherwise acceptable quality
评论详情: I got a Small when I'm usually a Medium but the Small is still big on me. When laid flat the waist measures 50 cm. The material is thin but not in a cheap way, its breathable and not see-through. Overall it's great for the price.
Necklace arrived broken
All fit well. Ears stay on. Daughter is excited to wear it for Halloween.
This is a great purchase for what I got! The headband is so cute and the ears make it look fun! The dress is well put together and I love the feel!

It's not worth 40 dollars it ripped after my daughter wore it for only an hour or 2 my daughter it 15 so it's not like she's rough on clothes. I wouldn't buy again and hopefully this helps the next one save your money look eles where.
Seems to run a bit big.
Daughter wanted for a ren faire, she loves it, perfect fit
This dress is super great. It fits true to size and it’s comfortable and breathable. The corset doesn’t go so tight that you can’t breathe.

This dress was such a disappointment. They screen printed the color onto the fabric or something. The color is only one sided. The inside is white. This means you can see the white from the giant bell sleeves. The bodice/corset is attached. Wish it was detachable. The whole thing looks cheap and feels cheap and just don't. Save your time and money by skipping this. If by chance you still wish to try it... The size I ordered is what Amazon told me to order, but it's way too big. Double check your measurements and don't go off the Amazon recommended size.

You can’t beat the price, and for what you pay you get a cute dress perfect for festivals or parties (my nieces 2nd birthday in my case) and lots of cute accessories. I was pleasantly surprised with how comfortable, soft, and breathable the fabric was. Can’t recommend it enough!

I am usually a L. I read all the reviews and most people said it ran big. So I ordered a medium and fit great. The corset part has minimum support, sizing down helped the corset to cinch my waist. Also looks a bit sexier if you pull down Neckline to shoulders, its stretchy material so size down!

The costume I bought two of came from two different places my costume which is the pink and purple ones and in this picture has already started falling apart the plastic boning has already started coming out of the corset was not worth $30 each u can tell it was cheaply made it is worth more like ten bucks if it is gonna fall a part after one wear .

Bought this for the Renaissance Festival. It was cute on the model photo, however, it didn't really fit to size. I ordered a small as that's what I would generally wear. Probably could've went with an XS. The corset top didn't lace up properly at all. Also, it has no ventilation to it so it was extremely hot.
Daughter wears it all the time. Ears didn't stay in place super well maybe some double sided tape would help

The corset is not the same as the picture, the colors are off and it is so unbelievably cheap. Id expect this from aliexpress for 5$. To be charging almost 40 is absolutely insane. If you disregard all of that and still buy, get two sizes down. I wear a medium and I got a medium, fits like an xl.
Return is essentially impossible.

Material is more costume-like, and runs large almost a size and half. The belt is awkward to place, this was for my daughter, she has an easy body style to fit in general and this was awkward? Order with time to adjust
Material is ok for the price. Thin and comfortable for warm weather. Seems to run bigger than normal. I ordered a small and it seems like a Med/large.
My daughter loved this dress and wears it all the time. It was bought for Halloween but she says it’s comfy.

评论概述: I will order again! I love this!
评论详情: I love this dress! It's exactly what I wanted for Winter Fairy for this year! This with another piece I'm going to review is perfect! I love this! The black fading to white is perfect. The necklace is nice too, 5 stars!
I ordered a small and it’s a little bigger it took relacing and tightening to nothing to make it fit but it’s not horrible
